result.title: CF Members Working/Studying Decision
result.content:
Hi everyone.

I am wondering to know more about the decisions of programming contestants for their future.

Do you want to continue your studies in PhD program ?if yes, which field do you think is better for you according to your strong algorithmic background ?

or maybe you prefer to get a job. which job position are you more interested in ?

I really like to hearing from you about your future plan as a programming competitor.
